content: I became happier when I focused on being a decent human being. Helping others something I do because it is my nature. Helping people does not make you any happier because you share their problems along with their success. I don’t know how to get happy. I live my life rightly and am grateful that I have moments of happiness. Due to illness, I may never feel very happy, I can accept that and have a good life. I work on living and loving, things I can do. Happiness comes by itself.
